snippet.title: Fossilized mammoth tusk removed from Seattle construction site
snippet.description:
* Seattle paleontologists Friday safely removed the largest fossilized mammoth tusk discovered in the region from a construction site, according to the Burke Museum of Natural History and Culture.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/02/14/us/seattle-mammoth-tusk/index.html

snippet.title: Apparently This Matters: Crap(py) taxidermy
snippet.description:
* The art of preparing, stuffing, and mounting animal skins is called taxidermy, and it can range from classy to creepy depending on whether your subject is a moose, or, say, a homeless drifter.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/04/tech/social-media/apparently-this-matters-crap-crappy-taxidermy/index.html

snippet.title: Chad Pregracke Of East Moline, IL Is The 2013 CNN “Hero Of The Year”
snippet.description:
* CNN Heroes: An All Star Tribute, hosted by Anderson Cooper, airs Sunday, December 1 at 8:00pm ET (New York) – November 19, 2013 – Stars of film, television, music and theater came to the American Museum of Natural History in New York City on Tuesday...
http://cnnpressroom.blogs.cnn.com/2013/11/19/chad-pregracke-of-east-moline-illinois-is-the-2013-cnn-hero-of-the-year/

snippet.title: Parade balloons ready to fly
snippet.description:
* A tangled web of hoses covered the streets around the Museum of Natural History in New York as 15 giant helium balloons were inflated late Wednesday afternoon. They're the premier attraction in the 85th annual Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade, which is...
http://news.blogs.cnn.com/2011/11/24/parade-balloons-ready-to-fly/

snippet.title: Why toddlers throw temper tantrums
snippet.description:
* With my 3-year-old twins in tow, I navigated several steep flights of subway stairs, managed four train transfers, and arrived safely at the Museum of Natural History in Manhattan. I took photos of them in front of the giant Apatosaurus skeleton and imparted (probably erroneous, but who cares?) facts about the Jurassic er...
http://www.cnn.com/2011/HEALTH/02/21/toddlers.temper.tantrums.parenting/index.html

snippet.title: 'Fake ice' rink offers softer landing
snippet.description:
* The American Museum of Natural History opened New York City's first synthetic ice-skating facility, the Polar Rink, in November on its outdoor terrace.
http://www.cnn.com/2008/TRAVEL/getaways/12/09/fake.ice.rink/index.html

snippet.title: Spotlight shines on CNN Heroes at tonight's gala
snippet.description:
* Celebrities and world luminaries are descending on the American Museum of Natural History in New York tonight to honor more than a dozen ordinary people for their extraordinary accomplishments.
http://www.cnn.com/2007/LIVING/12/06/heroes.advancer/index.html
